channel.title: Tmux on $ linux docs
channel.description: Recent content in Tmux on $ linux docs

item.title: Tmux Shortcuts
item.description: Default prefix: Ctrl+b Session Management tmux - Start new session tmux new -s name - Start new named session prefix + d - Detach from session Window Management prefix + c - Create new window prefix + n - Next window prefix + p - Previous window Pane Management prefix + % - Split pane vertically prefix + " - Split pane horizontally prefix + arrow - Navigate panes
